title: Google confirms Material You dynamic themes will appear on more devices
content:
The headline feature of Android 12 was Material You, a dynamic theme system that generates a color palette from your wallpaper and applies that across the system and some applications. However, Google’s theme engine wasn’t initially available for other manufacturers to use, so companies like Samsung or Xiaomi had to make their own implementations or

The post Google confirms Material You dynamic themes will appear on more devices appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Google says Material You-like dynamic colors will show up on more Android 12-powered phones and tablets soon.
